Getting Started with flexseq

Source: vignettes/flexseq.Rmd
flexseq.Rmd

Creating sequences

flexseq objects are persistent (immutable) sequences. Each update returns a new object.

x <- flexseq(1, 2, 3)
x
#> FingerTree <size=3, named=no>
#>   monoids: none
#> 
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 1
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 2
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 3

x2 <- as_flexseq(letters[1:5])
x2
#> FingerTree <size=5, named=no>
#>   monoids: none
#> 
#> [[1]]
#> [1] "a"
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] "b"
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] "c"
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] "d"
#> 
#> [[5]]
#> [1] "e"

Indexing 

x2[[3]]
#> [1] "c"

x3 <- x2[c(1, 3, 5)]
x3
#> FingerTree <size=3, named=no>
#>   monoids: none
#> 
#> [[1]]
#> [1] "a"
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] "c"
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] "e"

Appending and prepending 

x4 <- append(x2, "f")
x4
#> FingerTree <size=6, named=no>
#>   monoids: none
#> 
#> [[1]]
#> [1] "a"
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] "b"
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] "c"
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] "d"
#> 
#> [[5]]
#> [1] "e"
#> 
#> [[6]]
#> [1] "f"

x5 <- prepend(x4, "start")
x5
#> FingerTree <size=7, named=no>
#>   monoids: none
#> 
#> [[1]]
#> [1] "start"
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] "a"
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] "b"
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] "c"
#> 
#> [[5]]
#> [1] "d"
#> 
#> [[6]]
#> [1] "e"
#> 
#> ... and 1 more element not shown

Named sequences 

x_named <- as_flexseq(list(a = 1, b = 2, c = 3))
x_named
#> FingerTree <size=3, named=yes>
#>   monoids: none
#> 
#> $a
#> [1] 1
#> 
#> $b
#> [1] 2
#> 
#> $c
#> [1] 3

x_named[["b"]]
#> [1] 2
x_named$c
#> [1] 3

Concatenation 

x6 <- as_flexseq(4:6)
x7 <- c(x, x6)
x7
#> FingerTree <size=6, named=no>
#>   monoids: none
#> 
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 1
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 2
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 3
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 4
#> 
#> [[5]]
#> [1] 5
#> 
#> [[6]]
#> [1] 6

Folding 

sum_m <- measure_monoid(`+`, 0, as.numeric)

x8 <- as_flexseq(1:10)
fold_left(x8, sum_m)
#> [1] 55
